baseRule.text: 若比丘尼。語比丘尼作是語。阿梨耶。此處安居。後嫌呵惱觸波夜提。
baseRule.label: Classical Chinese Mahāsaṅghika Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 135

fullParallels.text: Yā pana bhikkhunī vassaṁvuṭṭhā cārikaṁ na pakkameyya antamaso chappañcayojanānipi, pācittiyaṁ.
fullParallels.label: Paḷī Theravāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 40

translations.text: Welche Nonne sich aber nicht auf die Wanderschaft begibt, nachdem sie die Regenzeit verbracht hat, noch nicht einmal nur fünf oder sechs Yojanas weit, muß dafür sühnen.
Should any bhikkhuni, having completed the rains retreat, not depart on a journey of at least five or six leagues, it is to be confessed.
Jika ada Bhikkhuni, setelah menyelesaikan masa vassa, tidak berangkat dalam sebuah perjalanan paling sedikit lima atau enam Yojanā (sekitar 55.91 – 67.09 KM), itu harus di akui.

fullParallels.text: 「若比丘尼，夏安居訖，不去者，波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 96

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼就安居請竟。一宿不去。波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 94

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼。自恣竟不遊行餘處一宿。波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 96

fullParallels.text: 若復苾芻尼夏安居。滿不離舊處人間遊行者。波逸底迦。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mūlasarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 102
